indicators.name: Resilience of maize yield Fertilizer
indicators.query: SELECT category, estimate::numeric as y, iso3, std_error::numeric as z, variable as x, variable as label FROM resilience_maize_analysis_tool where category like 'Fertilizer' or category like 'Climate' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Resilience of maize yield Education
indicators.query: SELECT category, estimate::numeric as y, iso3, std_error::numeric as z, variable as x, variable as label FROM resilience_maize_analysis_tool where category like 'Education' or category like 'Climate' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Resilience of maize yield Irrigation and seed
indicators.query: SELECT category, estimate::numeric as y, iso3, std_error::numeric as z, variable as x, variable as label FROM resilience_maize_analysis_tool where category like 'Irrigation and seed' or category like 'Climate' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Resilience of maize yield Extension services
indicators.query: SELECT category, estimate::numeric as y, iso3, std_error::numeric as z, variable as x, variable as label FROM resilience_maize_analysis_tool where category like 'Extension services' or category like 'Climate' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Resilience of maize yield Soil quality
indicators.query: SELECT category, estimate::numeric as y, iso3, std_error::numeric as z, variable as x, variable as label FROM resilience_maize_analysis_tool where category like 'Soil quality' or category like 'Climate' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Resilience of food security
indicators.query: with tru as (SELECT count(food_secure) x, scenario FROM resilience_maize_predictions where scenario like '%extension = observed' and iso3='%1' and food_secure = 'True'  group by food_secure, scenario), fals as (SELECT count(food_secure)as y, scenario FROM resilience_maize_predictions where scenario like '%extension = observed' and iso3='%1' and food_secure = 'False'  group by food_secure, scenario) select tru.scenario, tru.scenario as label, x, y from tru left join fals on tru.scenario=fals.scenario

indicators.name: National
indicators.query: with raster as (select the_raster_webmercator, 'TZA' as iso3 from soil_carbon_deficit_sagcot union select the_raster_webmercator, 'GHA' as iso3 from soil_carbon_deficit_gha) select round((ST_SummaryStats(st_union(the_raster_webmercator))).mean::numeric,2) as value from raster where iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Landscape
indicators.query: SELECT landscape as x, landscape as label, round(value::numeric,2) as value, thread as category FROM vs_indicators_landscape where thread='Soil health' and variable = 'Partial nutrient budget indicator mean' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: National
indicators.query: SELECT category, round(value::numeric, 1) as value, label  FROM vs_analysis_bio_national_temp WHERE iso3 = '%1'

indicators.name: Landscape
indicators.query: SELECT category, label, round(value::numeric, 1) as value FROM vs_analysis_bio_landscape_temp WHERE iso3 = '%1'

indicators.name: Climate chart
indicators.query: with r as (SELECT s.month as x,s.month as name, round(value::numeric,1) as z, round(precip::numeric,1) as y, r.iso3  FROM cru_ts3_23_tmp_1985_2015_monthly r inner join monthly_mean_precip_1981_2014 s on r.iso3=s.iso3 and r.month=s.month) select * from r where iso3='%1'
